comments:
Driver:  RC1 12/02 00:59

I created a Web project targeting Tomcat 5.0.  After creating a Java bean in the project, I exported the WAR.  When I tried to import the WAR, the Next button is disabled.  However, the Finish button is enabled.

Fixed the problem, 
The problem was happening due to wrong name passed while  adding    second page to the wizard.

Driver:  RC5

When importing WAR, the Next button is now enabled but if I clicked Next when importing newWP.war (will add as an attachment), then select all Web libraries and then click Finish, I got the exception:

The problem does not occur if I do not select any Web libraries.

If I'm reading this correctly, this can now wait till 101 ... presumably doesn't happen with all WARs, and work around is not to select all libraries? 

And, Kathy ... don't forget to attach that WAR, if you can.
code droped to cvs for 1.01 and 1.5 streams.
*** Bug 123767 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
